description: Fatally wounded by Wamuu and crushed by falling debris
Vaporized after being forced into the sunlight by Joseph Joestar and Caesar Anthonio Zeppeli
Impaled with a kick by Esidisi
Absorbed in a wall trap set by Kars
Split in half by Wamuu, euthanized via cardiac arrest by Caesar Anthonio Zeppeli
Died during the Battle of Stalingrad
Split in half by Lisa Lisa
